summary: An function-definition creates a new function within the enclosing module.
details: A function is the program entry point, iff:
There is one parameter whose type is String[].
A function corresponds to a static-method.
If the function contains a yield-statement, then it is a generator-function.
A XXX Exception is thrown at runtime, if two activations of the function are active at the same time.
The scope of variables declared in the function is the entire function.
Variables declared in the function are alive during the activation of the function.
checks: Each annotation in an annotation-list must be uniquely typed.
Only one function in a compilation-unit can have the @Start annotation present.
